## SearchHeadless.setFacetAllowList() method

Sets [VerticalSearchState.facetAllowlist](./search-headless.verticalsearchstate.facetallowlist.md) to the specified subset of facet field IDs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setFacetAllowList(facetAllowlist: string[] | undefined): void;
```

</th><th>

Description

facetAllowlist


</td><td>

string\[\] \| undefined


</td><td>

The subset of facet field IDs that facet options will be retrieved for.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

void
